survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?
How successful do you think you were at completing the task?
How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest

How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: hey!!! ya comenzamos?
hola
hola amigo! estoy en el punto de partida, veo una ramita hacia la izquierda que lleva a una isla pequeña con un tigre
what is my next move?
Vas a ir West hasta que llegues a una lora/parrot
perfecto, voy al oeste y ya veo la lora en un árbol en una isla grande
¿ahora qué?
Vas a cruzar dentro de el elefanta y la lora y vas a ir sobre las piedras hasta la isla que tiene una rana
genial, ya crucé al elefante y la lora. ahora veo las piedras hacia la isla con la rana
Ready, I'm there. What is the next step?
Cross the alligator and the black rock, then the grey rocks next to the giraffe
got it! crossed the alligator and the black rock
Ahora puedo ver las rocas grises al lado de la jirafa. ¿que sigue?
Vas a ir sur donde esta la serpiente
hecho! estoy en el sur donde está la serpiente
and now what else?
Go East right next to the snake and you will reach the treasure!
exacto! hice dos pasos hacia el este pasando la serpiente y ya veo el tesoro *finished*

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
Yes I am ready
great! start by taking a few steps towards the wooden bench to your left. go just below it where you'll see a trail that leads to a florist stand
Pero no vayas corriendo a las floristerías, aquí estás dando un rápido giro de 180 grados. ¿entiendo?
no
oh, sorry about that
basically, you need to turn around completely and go back across the trail towards where the white dog is sitting. let's go!
ok I am at the white dog at the bench
awesome! now you're gonna cross over that wooden branch and keep heading south
algo así como si estuvieras caminando por el mapa. Sigue adelante hasta que encuentres otro perro blanco relajándose junto a un picnic.
estoy con el perro blanco y el picnic, ahora que?
great, you're doing good! now go over the picnic mat, pretending you're looking for some berries to snack on
keep moving west after that
Ok I am at the log next to the fish
terrific! we're not here to fish though. so, cross the wooden branch northwards
Llegarás a un río, asegúrate de cruzarlo. ¿Puedes distinguirlo?
Si! cruze el rio
super job! up ahead you see a green bush, right? don't touch it! instead, take a right around it
keep going till you reach to our florist stand
I am at the florist stand
you're smashing this, mate! alright, now turn left and you're gonna walk right under that stand
Continúa hasta que veas un puente enorme y algunas personas andando en bicicleta, ¿cool?
ok i am there
fantastic! stay on track
head due west from there, bypassing the bridge
I am at the next stand
perfect! now you'll notice two elderly people reading newspapers
simplemente deslízate unos pasos hacia el sur entre ellos y la rama de madera cercana
estoy en la madera
sweet as! great job on reaching the branch! head east from there, keep the branch on one side and the bush on the other
off you go!

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
Ready, donde estas ahora
hey! estoy en la tienda al norte del mapa
where I'm going?
Head south towards the large dog
ok, i'm now at the dog, its left side is a fire
donde a continuación?
Head under the dog, then above the fire and continue to the mushrooms
alright, i see the red mushroom now on my right
am i going the right way?
yes! now make a slight left onto the path, avoiding the car and bushes
got it, path is clear now and i can see a blue telescope
¿guay, verdad? ¿Sigo yendo hacia el sur?
Si, sigues yendo hasta el sur hasta que llegues abajo de el telescope
perfect, estoy debajo del telescopio
I can see some rocks and a wooden house on the left. Should I go that route?
Yes, go under the rocks and follow the path and continue going left until you reach the house
awesome, i've reached the house
*finished*! that was fun, man. ¿otro juego?

chat.msg: hey!!! ya comenzamos?
Let's start!
awesome! head under the first palm on your left, turn right at the second, then take a sharp left before palm three, and keep going down
Ok I am near a dog
sweet! make sure you go left of the dog
turn a bit to your left then swing back to the right. head straight down, you got it!
I am near a crab
hey, crabby buddy! take a right turn here, and skim past that big rock
Sigue hacia el oeste en el agua. ¡Lo estás haciendo genial!
I am at the shark
woah, shark alert! make a hard right at the shark, dude
stay sharp!
I am near a voleyball now!
¡lindo! apriétate entre la roca mediana y esa pelota de voleibol multicolor y dirígete hacia el norte
I am at a speaker now
perfect, make a slight left and sneak between the red tent and the speaker, heading towards the northwest
I am between two rocks
alright, just cool as a cucumber, make an arc around the tent and keep heading south
¡no necesitas apresurarte!
I am at the kayak now, what do I do next?
lovely! don't hit the water, turn right before it
walk under the kayak heading further west. you're so close!
I am next to the kayak and the water
¡fantástico! Ahora gira rápidamente a la derecha, camina junto al kayak, ¡ya casi llegas!

general_survey.answer: I've lived in the USA since birth. Learned Spanish since birth and learned English at school.
general_survey.question: Have you ever lived in a home environment or country where your second language was spoken? If so, please explain briefly:
On a day-to-day basis, how likely are you to have a conversation using both your first and second languages?
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At work
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At home
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with friends
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with family
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Using social media
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?
What do you think when others mix languages in conversation? Please explain:

general_survey.answer: I already listed when I learned both languages in the previous page.
general_survey.question: Any final comments about your language background?
